note.p: Birth: Monton, near Manchester, Lancashire, England (09 September 1852)
Education: Owen's College, Manchester. BSc (1872, London). Trinity College, Cambridge. BA (1876). MA
Career: Assistant to Balfour Stewart (FRS 1862) at Manchester; Fellow of Trinity College, Cambridge; Professor of Physics, Mason College, Birmingham (1880-1914)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1915-1916 vol 92 pp i-ix, plate, signed by J J T
